oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of Early Treatment with Micotil on Animal Health and Performance of Stocker Cattle During Preconditioning and Winter Wheat Grazing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mechor, Gerald D.
Vogel, Gary
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Micotil
Bovine Respiratory Disease
BRD
early treatment
preconditioning
winter wheat
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two studies were conducted to evaluate the effects of early treatment with Micotil on animal health and performance of calves at high risk of contracting Bovine Respiratory Disease (BRD) during the preconditioning period and also while grazing winter wheat pasture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 175
